name: In Between Hell
description:
US Military bases on Deimos have been overrun from the depths of Hell. You have been selected to clear out the most important sites, they are =IN BETWEEN= worlds. You can not let them fall into a hellscape.

Assets used:

Basic 3d game pack (made by me), includes basic character movement and basic enemy movement.

Known error: A door that is supposed to be triggered open always stays open regardless. Fixed.
